thread.title: Joseph Pope
thread.title_full: KILL CLIFF reviewed by Joseph Pope

author: Joseph Pope
title: Joseph Pope
text: I had one to drink before work at about 9:30 in the morning. It was a good day for it, since I was bouncing around all over the place. I was still pretty amped up with caffeine til about 5pm, so I'd say it works and works well. The taste was pretty low key, overall I was happy with what I got.
